The ``phydmslib`` API
======================

Installation of `phydms`_ installs the ``phydmslib`` package, which provides the `Python`_ API.

This API can be imported into `Python`_ as for other packages (e.g. ``import phydmslib.pybpp``).

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   phydmslib
